Plot: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of $50,000 first.
Title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
Writer: Dale Launer, Stanley Shapiro, Paul Henning
Actors: Steve Martin, Michael Caine, Glenne Headly, Anton Rodgers
tomatoConsensus: A buoyant, clever update of the conman flick Bedtime Story, with plenty of comedic jousting resulting from a winning chemistry between Michael Caine and Steve Martin.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.
